1.content: when they get there jaden challenges alexis to a duel does she accept
1.title: duel ?

choices: She takes Jaden to her room
She wait until he wakes up
She gets help from the others
11.content:
"Yeah.I'll accept your challenge Jaden."said Alexis
"Heh alright.See you at the dueling field and you better have your game on."he said.
As Jaden walked away he shrugged off a feeling telling him that something bad was going to happen."Must be nothing."he said to himself.
Hours later...

"Alright,you ready Alexis?"
"Ready Jaden."
"Lets duel." they said in union.
Jaden drew his first five cards. Alright he thought to himself,I got myself a good hand."I'll go first",said Jaden,"I'll play fusion gate and fuse elemental heros Phersinitrx,Wingman,and Sparkman to make Elemental Hero Shining Flare Wingman."
Many turn later...

"Alright, Elemental Hero Mudball Man finish the job."said Jaden
The duel ended with Jaden 1050 LP and Alexis 0LP.
"Good duel Alexis."
"Yeah your getting better everyday Jaden."
"Thanks."
Just as Jaden reached for his cards the dueling field went haywire and shocked Jaden.
"AHHHH"he yelled in pain then a small expolsion occured.
"JADEN! JADEN! Are you okay?!"said Alexis while running to where he was.There was no damage mark but Jaden wasn't there anymore.She despretly looked around yelling his name.
Then she looked down to see Jaden 3inchs tall to add to that he was also out cold.
11.title: A duel gone wrong.

choices: Jaden wakes up early with a problem
111.content:
Alexis feeling concern for Jaden took him to her room.She was also confused about what happened.She thought about how this could of happened and why.
(Jaden's point of view)
Jaden woke unaware of his suroundings."Man what happened.The last I remember was dueling Alexis then there was a pain.Whatever its over...whoa.I don't think I'm in the Dueling Academy anymore." Jaden looked around at his suroundings. They look like normal objects from a bedroom except they were many times his size.
"Man either I'm dreaming or this real."
"Sorry Jaden but this for real."said a soft sympathetic voice
Jaden shivered then turn around slowly to see somebody's huge eyes staring at him.
"AHHHh!"Jaden took many steps backwards before triping over something soft.
"Wait a minute. Th-that a bed curl!Ah man that mean I've shrunk and if that a bed curl that means I'm in somebodys room!"
"Jaden,its me Alexis and your in my room."
Jaden turned around to see a giant Alexis towering over him.
"A-Alexis?!Is that really you?"
"Yes Jaden it me.Anyway whats wrong. You look like you saw a ghost."
"Well,it's just little too much for me to take in."he said while taking a few steps back. It not that he wanted to it's just instinct.Alexis saw him doing that and decided to bend to the bed to not look so intimdating.
"Look sorry for scaring you Jaden. So what do you think happened to you?"Jaden looked up at Alexis's face.
"I've got no idea."
"Look were going to have to look over this in the morning and maybe you'll remember something."
"Yeah sure."
"I'm going to change into my gown.I'll be right back."
In Jaden's thoughts he kept saying to himself "Why am I always the one with problems."
Alexis came back and Jaden thought she look even more beutiful than normal.
"Jaden it kind of late it's time for us to go to sleep."
"Come Alexis.I've still got energy in me"As we all know Jaden is acustome to going to sleeping late at night and sleeping in classes.
"Well I'm not going miss any of my classes because of you,okay?"
"Fine,fine i'll go to sleep."he said not whating to make her angry in any way.
"Good boy"she said with a smile and tapped him on the head gentlefully.
Then she turn off the light and Jaden fell asleep right next to her on the bed.
111.title: Jaden's Point of View

choices: They encounter a problem while getting his deck.
They get his deck with no problem.
1112.content:
"Jaden, Jaden wake up. This is important."
"Just a few more minutes." he said sleepily
"Hate to do this to you". Then she put her head near Jaden and yelled,"Wake up!!!"
"YEEOOW"he said while jumping up and covering his ears,"Okay! Okay I'm up. Jeez. So what's wrong?"
"Alexis. Just so you know your voice is a heck of louder to me than to you,ya know. If you just yelled while standing up that would have still scared me up only with the pain." he said rubbing his ears.
"Sorry I didn't know that, anyway we have to get your deck from the dueling field."
"Ohh yeah, I almost forgot about my deck." he said grinning and rubbing the back of his head,"Lets go get it."
"Your going to have to wait because I'm not leaving with my gown on."
"You do have a point Alexis" he said looking up at her.

A couple of minutes later...
"Alright lets go." she said picking up Jaden.
"Yeah."
1112.title: What about Jaden's Deck?

11122.content:
As they were leaving Alexis put Jaden on her shoulder. "Oh wait. Alexis."
"What?"
"I don't want anybody else to know this,okay?"
"Okay, but why?"
"Because I'm usually the one who gets you guys into trouble that's why?" he said.
"That is true."
"Any way...Yikes!"
"What is it?"
"Crowller thats what." he said, then he dropped himself behind Alexis's shoulder and held till Crowller pasted. When he tried to climb back up his shoes weren't able to grip Alexis's uniform.
"Um Alexis, a little help here if you don't mind."
"I do mind."
"Wait what?!!!" he yelled frightened. Then she started to laugh."Don't worry Jaden. I was just joking." she said still giggling as she help Jaden. Then she held Jaden up to he ear to hear what he was going to say.
"Hmph, really funny Alexis. So funny I forgot to laugh"
"Don't be like that" she said when she had Jaden on her open hand then she started to tickle Jaden on the stomach.
"Hey, wait A-A-Alexis stop hahaha, no seriously haha stop." he said then he started to laugh so much he couldn't talk.
"Alright Alexis, I give up already." he said feeling a bit winded.
"Sorry Jaden, I just couldn't resist. Any way here we are."
Then she walked up to the dueling field.
"Good my cards shrunk also." After he picked them up Alexis told him that she needed to get to class.
11122.title: Jaden's Bad Trip

choices: Go with Syrus and the others
111221.content:
"What a minute Alexis. Where am I suppose to be when your in class?"
"Hmm. I know. I'll take you to class then put you on the floor where no one will see you." When she went to class her mind was on her studys but she was also preoccupied with Jaden's problem. How was she to help Jaden,if Jaden didn't want anybody else to know what happened to him. Jaden mean while fell asleep like always in the class.

Later...
They were in Alexis room but Alexis wasn't there. She went to get food. Jaden was reviewing his deck while she was getting food. Jaden thought about his friends. He cared about them but he didn't want to worry them. He knew that if he told them they would worry more than they already are. The door started to open, so Jaden hid near the pillow just in case that it wasn't Alexis and it wasn;t. Instead it was Zane, Syrus's older brother and one of the top student in duelist academy.
"Alexis. Are you there?" he asked. He left after he noted that she wasn't there. A few minutes after Alexis came in with some food.
"Alexis." he said in a low voice,"Am I putting you in a lot of trouble?" Alexis looked down at Jaden surprised. "No, of course not Jaden. I mean anything to help a friend, right?"
"Yeah, a friend." he said lowly. Alexis started to feel sad for Jaden. She knew that he felt helpless to do anything and that he could do anything to help.
"Oh Jaden. I didn't mean to make you feel sad or anything."
"Huh, oh, don't worry. It wasn't what you said" he lied. When she used the word friend he thought of what he was putting Alexis through. At noon he went to sleep without eating much. Alexis had trouble going to sleep right a way know Jaden was in a down mood.
111221.title: Sadness

1112211.content:
Elsewhere Syrus and the others met...

"Has anybody seen Jaden? I'm starting to get a little worried."
"Come to think of it I haven't Jaden anywhere." said Tyranno.
"Nor have I" added Bastion.
"The last time I saw Jaden was when he asked Alexis to a duel." said Chazz.
Blair on the other hand kept quiet and listened to the others talking while her concern built up.
"Perhaps Alexis know the were abouts of Jaden." said Bastion.
"Maybe. Maybe not but still we have to try." said Syrus.
"I'll ask her about Jaden!" Blair said quickly.
Alright then i't settled. Blair will ask Alexis where Jaden is and then we'll look for him." said Tyranno.
"Alright we'll meet here after classes and try to figure out where Jaden is." said Bastion
"I'll try to ask Alexis where Jaden is to see whether she knows." Blair said.

Note:The reason Blair volenttered to look for Jaden is that she is currently in love with him and she is in Slifer Red.

Back with Jaden...

"AAahhh-choo! I think somebody is talking about me." Jaden thought to himself
1112211.title: The Meeting

11122111.content:
As Jaden was woundering about who was talking about him, someone came in the room.

It was a boy with unruly brown hair and green eyes dressed in a simple black shirt and jeans that did well to outline his slender figure.

What caught Jaden's attention was what was around his neck: The Millennium ring

"Hey who are you?" Jaden asked

"My name is Trigger, but everyone keeps calling me MegaMan." he said

(See http://www.fanfiction.net/s/3548517/1/Me...)

Just then, Zorc took over Trigger useing the Millennium ring.

"So do you want to be restored? Beat me and I'll do it."

"Game on!" Jaden said

info.brief_description: A friendly duel turns into a big problem for Jaden
info.description:
The story of Alexis and tiny Jaden continues, now you get to add to the story. Please keep the story along the same lines and no language or sexual content. Keep the story clean as I want to keep it. The story can have characters from the GX series or from the original Yu-Gi-Oh series making an appearance in the story.
No bad or evil giantesses in the story please. I'LL SHOOT MYSELF IF I SEE ONE!!!! AAAAAAAAAAGGGGGGGGGGGHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!! Anyway have a good time, everyone. Ciao.
